Class TcpCommunicator

java.lang.Object
  ilsrep.poll.client.TcpCommunicator

public class TcpCommunicator
extends java.lang.Object

Handles TCP socket connection with the server

Author:
DRC

Constructor Detail

TcpCommunicator

public TcpCommunicator()
                throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                       java.io.IOException
Constructs TcpCommunicator, that connects to localhost(127.0.0.1). port 3320.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - If I/O exception occurs.
java.net.UnknownHostException - If host is unknown(shoundn't be).
See Also:
TcpCommunicator

TcpCommunicator

public TcpCommunicator(java.lang.String serverIP,
                       int port)
                throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                       java.io.IOException
Constructs TcpCommunicator, that connects to specified server and port.

Parameters:
serverIP - Server to connect.
port - Port to connect.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If I/O exception occurs.
java.net.UnknownHostException - If host is unknown.

finalize

public void finalize()
Making sure that the socket is closed before the object is gced. Virtually a destructor.

Overrides:
finalize in class java.lang.Object
See Also:
TcpCommunicator

getXML

public Pollsession getXML()
                   throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException,
                          java.io.IOException
Retreives XML from server(for console usage). Asks for the poll id, sends XML request, receives byte data from server and converts it to a Reader object.

Returns:
xmlBuffered received XML from server
Throws:
java.io.IOException - On network I/O errors.
javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - On corrupted output from server.
See Also:
TcpCommunicator

Parameters:

Received XML from server.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - On network I/O errors.
